INTTK int
IDENFR getSum
LPARENT (
INTTK int
IDENFR a
LBRACK [
RBRACK ]
COMMA ,
INTTK int
IDENFR len
RPARENT )
LBRACE {
INTTK int
IDENFR i
ASSIGN =
INTCON 0
COMMA ,
IDENFR sum
ASSIGN =
INTCON 0
SEMICN ;
FORTK for
LPARENT (
SEMICN ;
IDENFR i
LSS <
IDENFR len
SEMICN ;
IDENFR i
ASSIGN =
IDENFR i
PLUS +
INTCON 1
RPARENT )
LBRACE {
IFTK if
LPARENT (
IDENFR a
LBRACK [
IDENFR i
RBRACK ]
GRE >
INTCON 100
RPARENT )
CONTINUETK continue
SEMICN ;
IDENFR sum
ASSIGN =
IDENFR sum
PLUS +
IDENFR a
LBRACK [
IDENFR i
RBRACK ]
SEMICN ;
RBRACE }
RETURNTK return
IDENFR sum
SEMICN ;
RBRACE }

COMMA ,
IDENFR i
ASSIGN =

IDENFR j

SEMICN ;
FORTK for

SEMICN ;

SEMICN ;
RPARENT )

IFTK if

NOT !

RPARENT )

SEMICN ;

INTTK int
IDENFR k
SEMICN ;
FORTK for
LPARENT (
IDENFR k
ASSIGN =
INTCON 0
SEMICN ;
SEMICN ;
IDENFR k
ASSIGN =
IDENFR k

INTCON 1
RPARENT )
LBRACE {
IFTK if

IDENFR k

IDENFR j
RPARENT )
BREAKTK break
SEMICN ;

LPARENT (
STRCON "%d "
COMMA ,
IDENFR b

RPARENT )

RETURNTK return
SEMICN ;

INTTK int
MAINTK main
LPARENT (
RPARENT )
LBRACE {
PRINTFTK printf
LPARENT (
STRCON "23371008\n"
RPARENT )
SEMICN ;

IDENFR a
LBRACK [
INTCON 5
RBRACK ]

LBRACE {
INTCON 0
COMMA ,
MINU -
INTCON 2
COMMA ,
INTCON 50

INTCON 123
COMMA ,
INTCON 3
RBRACE }
SEMICN ;
PRINTFTK printf
LPARENT (
STRCON "%d\n"
COMMA ,
IDENFR getSum

RPARENT )

IDENFR arr

RPARENT )

STRCON "%d\n"

RPARENT )

IDENFR testArray
LPARENT (
IDENFR arr
RPARENT )
SEMICN ;
PRINTFTK printf
LPARENT (
STRCON "\nTest is over."
RPARENT )
SEMICN ;

INTCON 0
SEMICN ;
RBRACE }
